text:
Ranveer Singh is a STAR. Whatever he touches turns into gold. He has hit jackpot with most of his films right from Padmavaat to Simmba. And after his smashing hit Simmba he is all set to hit the big screen with his most ambitious project Gully Boy.
The actor shared the teaser on social media and sent the internet into a meltdown. He floored everyone with his unbeatable talent yet again, the moment you hit play on the teaser, you won't be able to take your eyes off Mr. Singh.
Ranveer has not only managed to woo the audiences with the teaser but he won his wife Deepika Padukone’s heart too.
Twitter Don't Miss 185 SHARES 336 SHARES 460 SHARES 544 SHARES 247 SHARES
Deepika is probably his biggest fan. She is proud of husband Ranveer and couldn't stop herself from praising him, she wrote, “I love you and I am so proud of you. You are Unstoppable”. Well, the actor has got lady luck on his side so he can never go wrong.
Twitter
Apart from Deepika, Abhishek Bachchan, Arjun Kapoor, and Karan Johar too couldn’t stop raving about the teaser. Here’s what they had to say.
Asli talent ki vulcano #ZoyaAkhtar with apna dil ka raja @RanveerOfficial & mini meryll @aliaa08 produced by the Maverick trendsetters @FarOutAkhtar & @ritesh_sid cannot wait for Valentines Day cause it’s a date with #GullyBoy !!! https://t.co/fdn63fCtdF — Arjun Kapoor (@arjunk26) January 4, 2019
I love love love this!!!!!!! Zoya you star!!!!! Can’t wait to see #GullyBoy ❤️❤️❤️ https://t.co/hpY139NsY4 — Karan Johar (@karanjohar) January 4, 2019
Talking about Gully Boy, Ranveer in an interview with us had said, “After Padmaavat, I did Gully Boy and completed it and then did Simmba. In Gully Boy, I had to be this quiet boy who deals with a lot of inner emotions. In fact after shooting for a scene, I used to not even see the monitor, we shot the entire film and I didn’t even see one scene of mine, I had no clue about it, after the shooting Zoya went to New York for 6 months for the edit of the film, and just yesterday she showed me the teaser of the film and I was like F***K. It is that crazy, I swear if there would be an actor other than me in this teaser I would be burnt to crisp, I would be damn jealous of that actor. It’s Mumbai, its Hip hop, It’s ME”.
If you haven’t seen the teaser then you are definitely missing out. The teaser also features Alia Bhatt and Kalki Koechlin, both the actresses look outstanding and super promising.
